c74object.name: rtt.rprob~

method.name: in4
method.description: A list of probabilities that will be evaluated in left-to-right order for each new event determined by triggermode

method.name: probabilities
method.description: The same as in4, prepended by the symbols "message probabilities"

attribute.name: output
attribute.digest: Determines how the output of the first outlet represents the patternâ€™s position. For non-activated steps, the output is always 0.

enum.name: none
enum.description: The first outlet outputs a signal of value 0.

enum.name: input
enum.description: The value at the first inlet is passed through to the input.

enum.name: step
enum.description: The index of the step in the pattern.

enum.name: eventcount
enum.description: A running count of the number of events.

enum.name: gate
enum.description: The value 1 for the duration of the step.

attribute.name: trigger
attribute.digest: Determines how the object responds to signals to the first and second inlets.

enum.name: trigger
enum.description: A trigger is required at the second inlet to evaluate a new step in the pattern. The value at the first inlet is used to select the step to be evaulated.

enum.name: change
enum.description: A new step in the pattern is evaluated any time the signal value at the first inlet changes.

enum.name: count
enum.description: The first inlet is ignored. A trigger at the second inlet causes a step to be evaluated, and the step is chosen by keeping a running count of triggers received at the second inlet.

c74object.description: rtt.rprob~ accepts a list of floating point numbers that represent the likelihood that a musical event will occur. This object can be used to create probabilistic rhythms or to add variation to other rhythms.
